meanings.sent1: The seesaw was imbalanced with one side much heavier than the other.
meanings.sent2: The imbalanced distribution of toys in the room made it difficult to walk around.
meanings.sent3: The cake looked imbalanced with all the frosting piled on one side.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were imbalanced, swinging wildly from joy to sadness.
meanings.sent5: The wobbly table was so imbalanced that it spilled drinks with the slightest touch.

meanings.sent1: The imbalanced design of the building made it look lopsided.
meanings.sent2: Her artwork was criticized for being imbalanced in color and composition.
meanings.sent3: The imbalanced arrangement of fruits in the bowl made it look like a modern art piece.
meanings.sent4: The imbalanced team struggled to work together effectively, lacking key skills in some areas.
meanings.sent5: The imbalanced scales in the painting symbolized the unequal distribution of power.
